author: tocheng
body:
Backport of PR #22455 

Not just code rebase. Some modification is done in SiPixelStatusProducer to be compatible with CMSSW_10_0_X framework.

The accumulator feature in EDProducer is not available before CMSSW_10_1_X.
https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/FWMultithreadedFrameworkOneModuleInterface#edm_Accumulator,
so one has to use "produce()" function.

To make the "produce()" function in the EDAnalyzer run in the unscheduled mode,
ALCARECO trigger bit 
https://github.com/tocheng/cmssw/blob/SiPixelQualityPCL_For_CMSSW_10_0_X/CalibTracker/SiPixelQuality/plugins/SiPixelStatusProducer.cc#L76
https://github.com/tocheng/cmssw/blob/SiPixelQualityPCL_For_CMSSW_10_0_X/CalibTracker/SiPixelQuality/plugins/SiPixelStatusProducer.cc#L165-L191

is stored as a string event-by-event
https://github.com/tocheng/cmssw/blob/SiPixelQualityPCL_For_CMSSW_10_0_X/CalibTracker/SiPixelQuality/plugins/SiPixelStatusProducer.cc#L292-L294

Both the per-event ALCARECO trigger bit string and  the per-lumi collection is stored in the ALCARECO output.
https://github.com/tocheng/cmssw/blob/SiPixelQualityPCL_For_CMSSW_10_0_X/CalibTracker/SiPixelQuality/python/ALCARECOSiPixelCalZeroBias_Output_cff.py#L8-L15
title: SiPixel Quality PCL for cmssw 10_0_X
